product_overview: Plana is a comprehensive event management platform designed to provide users with seamless event discovery, booking, and management, while empowering admins to oversee events, users, and support issues with real-time insights.
core_goals: Deliver an engaging and high-performance landing page using modern animation and smooth scrolling for first-time visitors.
Allow users to securely sign up, log in, and maintain authenticated sessions with role-based access control.
Provide users with an intuitive dashboard reflecting live event bookings and personal data.
Enable admins to manage events, view global metrics like revenue and user statistics, and handle user-reported issues effectively.
Facilitate smooth event booking workflows with real-time availability checking and transaction feedback.
Offer a support system that allows users to report issues and receive timely responses from admins.
Automate background services to handle periodic checks and trigger notifications without user intervention.
key_features: Dynamic Landing Page leveraging GSAP and Lenis for enhanced user experience.
Authentication system including signup, login, and JWT-based session management with role differentiation.
Global Navigation Bar and Footer for consistent site navigation.
User Dashboard displaying live personal booking stats and events.
Admin Dashboard providing global insights, event management tools, and issue resolution interfaces.
Events Gallery for browsing and booking events.
Support page for users to report issues and track their support history.
Backend API securing data transactions, event bookings, and user management with encrypted passwords and JWT authentication.
Real-time data synchronization between frontend and backend ensuring live updates to dashboards and stats bars.
Background cron jobs for automated welcome messaging and system monitoring every 5 seconds.
user_flow_summary: A new visitor lands on the homepage greeted by an animated and smooth-scrolling interface.
The visitor signs up for a new account via the Signup page; upon success, they log in and receive a JWT token stored in session context.
Upon login, users are directed to their respective dashboards based on their roles (User or Admin).
Users browse available events in the Events Gallery, select events to book, and complete bookings which update their dashboard in real-time.
Admins access the Admin Dashboard to view platform-wide metrics and perform event management tasks, including creation, approval, and deletion of events.
Users needing assistance visit the Support page to file issues; admins respond through the Issues Management tab within the Admin Dashboard.
Continuous background jobs monitor the system state, trigger notifications, and ensure data freshness without user intervention.
validation_criteria: Landing Page components animate smoothly with GSAP and Lenis integration verified on multiple browsers.
Authentication workflows enforce secure signup/login with JWT properly stored and validated.
Dashboard data (both User and Admin) refresh dynamically to reflect current data without page reload.
Event booking checks availability accurately and updates the backend and dashboard in real-time.
Admin event actions (create, approve, delete) persist correctly in the database and trigger UI updates.
Support issue submissions are saved and admins can respond, with responses immediately visible to users.
Background services run every 5 seconds to handle new event and user checks and send notifications as designed.
Overall system security is confirmed by encryption of sensitive data and protected API routes via JWT middleware.
